scripts.start: ENV_FILE=backend/local.env concurrently -k -n backend,frontend "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run build:dev:watch"
scripts.dev: ENV_FILE=backend/local.env concurrently -k -n backend,frontend "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
